original_title: 悦楽の性界 淫らしましょ！
overview: Momo (Celebrity Japanese adult starlet Sho Nishino) is very unlucky. All the guys she dates are only after her money, and she discovers she has only six months left to live. Momo meets Ms. Devil Girl Succubus (played by Japanese cult icon Asami) who proposes to grant her one wish. In return, the succubus wants her soul for eternity. A sexy and entertaining erotic parody of the film Bedazzled.
title: The Succulent Succubus
